Class SessionManager

java.lang.Object
com.qdc.lims.ui.SessionManager
public class SessionManager extends Object
Session manager supporting multiple simultaneous user sessions. Each window (Stage) can have its own logged-in user. For backward compatibility, also maintains a "current" session concept which tracks the most recently active window.
